panels.description: Number of hint messages written to this node since [re]start. Includes one entry for each host to be hinted per hint.

panels.description: Number of hints attemping to be sent currently.

panels.description: Size, in bytes, of the on disk data size this node manages.

panels.description: Estimated number of compactions remaining to perform

panels.description: Number of tasks being actively worked on by this pool.

panels.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool.
